attributes.title: Aquafresh Toothpaste
attributes.description:
Created on February 24, 2010 by toddreily on Sourcemap.org:

Aquafresh is a brand of toothpaste that has been on sale since 1973.  It is manufactured by consumer healthcare product maker GlaxoSmithKline. One of its distinguishing features is its striped pattern; currently the stripes are red, white, and blue (aqua), although initially there were only blue and white stripes. The slogan for Aquafresh is "three in one protection for your family".
